After a few days of extensive search efforts, he was traced back to his home, having returned on his own.

circumstances: Bryan Jones was reported missing from his home in Glasgow after his sisters became concerned about his welfare. Bryan, who had recently been outed as LGBTQ+, was known for visiting an abandoned building near Acre Road, where he was suspected to be squatting. His brother mentioned Bryan had exhibited suicidal ideation in past weeks, heightening the urgency in locating him. After hours of investigation, police traced him to the same abandoned building, where he was found unhurt but in need of emotional support. Bryan's vulnerability due to his disability and the stress of recent personal revelations were key factors in the incident.
